name: Sonic Insights[EARLY DEMO]
description:
Sonic The Hedgehog Journey in 3D!

Story:

After 3 years of Sonic Forces Dr.Eggman found ruby,which was made by Dr. Gerald Robotnik - E-L01(Eclipse).This ruby can summon enemies,friends and creatures from past of character.Eggman tried to take this ruby,but ruby was even stronger,than he thought. Next,Sonic after his trip on Mystic Ruins comes to Tails' Workshop to fly on the mystery island.They're started to looking for Eclipse

Go through new Horizons!

Explore new islands!

Fight Dr.Eggman!

All Sonic The Hedgehog Copyright to Sega,Sonic Team.

Game by FlickMax

Discord Server - https://discord.gg/Z8ZFT7Xd5k

[It's still a Demo Version,so most of things you see in game can be improved]
